label: What is the site of this flight?
What is the date of this flight?
How long did this flight last?
What was the altitude of this flight?
What did I succeed at?
exemple: Ex. weather preparation, advice from a friend, managing a collapse…

label: A moment of doubt
exemple: Ex. turbulence in the area where it usually climbs…

label: What did I use (preparation, piloting, knowledge, verbalization, imagery, breathing)
exemple: Ex. exercises from the last course, box breathing…

label: What helped me achieve my goal
exemple: Ex. knowledge of the site, confidence in my piloting…

label: What made me happy
exemple: Ex. landing calmly despite difficult conditions…

label: If I had to do it differently
exemple: Ex. stop earlier if too strong, pay more attention to breathing…
